message: Declaration of My_Custom_Walker::start_el(&$output, $page, $depth, $args, $current_page) must be compatible with Walker_Page::start_el(&$output, $data_object, $depth = 0, $args = [], $current_object_id = 0) in /wordpress/wp-content/plugins/lingenio-translation-service/pg_public/navigation.php on line 9
